title: Software Engineer Intern
overview: I contributed to the enhancement and standardization of Wat.erp, a large-scale ERP dedicated to customer management in the water, energy, and sanitation sectors. My work focused on improving the system’s security, performance, and usability. I redesigned the authorization engine to reinforce access control and simplify role management, developed dynamic parameterization interfaces to increase user autonomy, and took part in debugging and performance tuning of core modules.

title: Founder & Software Engineer
overview: Designed and developed a full-stack healthcare platform to modernize medical services in Morocco. Built with React.js, Angular, and Spring Boot, the platform includes role-based access, appointment scheduling, patient record management, and secure deployment via Docker on a VPS.

title: Software Engineer Intern
overview: Developed an online platform for Afriworks to showcase services and projects with a service quote request feature.

title: Software Engineer Intern
overview: Developed a comprehensive training management platform for GTEL Academy, focusing on course management, user registration, and certification processes. Implemented a DevOps approach with Git Flow and integrated event and blog management features.

title: Software Engineer Intern
overview: Contributed to the development of a web application for seamless event organization between clients and service providers.

title: Software Engineer Intern
overview: Developed a web application promoting tourism in the Drâa Tafilalet region, facilitating hotel reservations and enhancing tourism services.
